str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

word: a man who is not circumcised
str2: From akron and probably a modified form of posthe; the prepuce; by implication, an uncircumcised state or person.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Probably from phule through the idea of isolation; to watch, i.e. Be on guard; by implication, to preserve, obey, avoid.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From dikaioo; an equitable deed; by implication, a statute or decision.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From akron and probably a modified form of posthe; the prepuce; by implication, an uncircumcised state or person.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
